title: GIS Based Spatial Analysis of Landslide Hazard in Tehsil Balakot, KP, Pakistan
description: Comprehensive spatial analysis of landslide susceptibility using GIS techniques, incorporating geological, topographical, and hydrological factors to assess hazard zones in the earthquake-prone region of Balakot.
highlights: Developed landslide susceptibility maps using weighted overlay analysis
Integrated multiple data sources including DEM, geology, and precipitation data
Identified high-risk areas for disaster preparedness planning
Applied machine learning techniques for hazard prediction

title: Ecotourism Potential Assessment for District Lower Chitral, Pakistan Using Integration of GIS and Remote Sensing
description: Comprehensive assessment of ecotourism potential using GIS-based multi-criteria analysis, evaluating natural resources, accessibility, infrastructure, and environmental sensitivity to identify suitable areas for sustainable tourism development.
highlights: Developed suitability maps for ecotourism development
Assessed carrying capacity for sustainable development
